# Next.js Standards

When working with Next.js framework files, follow the conventions defined in `docs/NEXTJS_STANDARDS.md`.
For TypeScript language standards, also reference `docs/TYPESCRIPT_STANDARDS.md`.
For design patterns, also reference `docs/DESIGN_PATTERNS.md`.
